name: Dye Siege
description:
Instructions:

Combine energy from crystals to obtain the color you need. You attack and defend in turns. When attacking you need to use color that is missing in enemy shields - only 1 of 7 colors is correct! When defending you have to match color of your shield to color of enemy spell. You have limited time do destroy enemy castle!

Controls:

Q/W/E - Toggle Red/Green/Blue crystal. You can also click on them with LMB.

Space - Launch spell

Credits:

Font - November Font, Tepid Monkey Fonts, November Font · 1001 Fonts

Sound effects:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/muffled-distant-explosion
  • https://opengameart.org/content/wall-impact
  • https://opengameart.org/content/25-cc0-bang-firework-sfx
  • https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-sound-effects-download/magic-spell-...
  • https://opengameart.org/content/energy-drain
  • https://opengameart.org/content/4-atmospheric-ghostly-loops
  • https://opengameart.org/content/action-shooter-soundset-wwvi
  • https://opengameart.org/content/click

Music:

  • Menu - "OF CASTLES, MAGIC AND SPELLS_Remixed", Eric Matyas, https://soundimage.org/fantasy-10/
  • In-game - Battle in the winter, Johan Brodd, https://opengameart.org/content/battle-in-the-winter

The art was made by myself
